code: import*as httpRequest from"../utils/httpRequest";export const createSkill=async data=>{try{return await httpRequest.post("skills/create/",data,'"Content-Type": "application/json"');}catch(error){return error;}};export const updateSkill=async(data,id)=>{try{return await httpRequest.update("skills/update/",data,id,true,'"Content-Type": "application/json"');}catch(error){return error;}};export const getSkill=async()=>{try{return await httpRequest.get("skills/",{});}catch(error){return error;}};export const deleteSkill=async id=>{try{return await httpRequest.remote('skills/delete',id);}catch(error){return error;}};
